## slu digitalocean all delete

Delete ALL resources in DigitalOcean account

### Synopsis

Delete ALL resources in DigitalOcean account

	Currently, all resources means:

	- Droplets
	- SSH Keys
	- Domains (with records)
	

```
slu digitalocean all delete [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for delete
```
